book.cultivation_intro_book.content_0: Stepping on the path of cultivation is not for the faint of heart. It is full of trials and tribulations, and letting go of those things which are the toughest to let go of. If you still intend to become a cultivator, the first thing you'll need is a qi cultivation skill. Herein is one such skill. If you intend to become a cultivator of any note, you will undoubtedly replace this one with a more efficient method.Cras eget est sed dolor semper commodo. Donec volutpat sed nibh et hendrerit. Phasellus fermentum mi et pellentesque scelerisque. In efficitur mi id pellentesque congue. Donec nec magna est. Fusce non mi sit amet orci tempor vulputate. Nunc ornare sollicitudin leo, ut ornare libero. Donec interdum elit at risus aliquam scelerisque. Sed est ipsum, maximus eget arcu id, pharetra semper magna. Pellentesque et varius purus.
skill.base_skill.description: These are basic skills without any special attributes.
skill.base_skill.lore: The journey of a thousand miles begins with the first step.
skill.basic_qi_enhance_skill.description: Use this skill to increase your maximum qi.
